title: First Ride: Zipp’s 303 SW Wheels Have a Built-In Pressure Sensor — But There’s a Lot More to Them Than That
content:
The new Zipp 303 SW wheels replace the Firecrest with an updated focus and an AXS connected pressure sensor on board.

Read the full article at First Ride: Zipp’s 303 SW Wheels Have a Built-In Pressure Sensor — But There’s a Lot More to Them Than That on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
